name: Classic Philadelphia Cheesecake
ingredients: 1 3/4 cups Honey Maid graham cracker crumbs
3 (8 ounce) packages Philadelphia Cream Cheese, softened
1 cup Breakstone's or Knudsen Sour Cream
directions: Mix graham crumbs, butter and 1/4 cup sugar; press onto bottom of 9-inch springform pan.
Beat cream cheese and remaining sugar in large bowl with mixer until blended.
Add sour cream and vanilla; mix well.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating on low speed after each addition just until blended.
Bake 1 hour to 1 hour 10 minutes or until center is almost set.
Run knife around rim of pan to loosen cake.
Top with pie filling before serving.
